trans-unit.source: Allows the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> to recognize a type when it serializes or deserializes an object as encoded SOAP XML.
trans-unit.target: Permite que <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> reconozca un tipo al serializar o deserializar un objeto como XML SOAP codificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute> class belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes, or deserializes, an object as encoded SOAP XML.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute> clase pertenece a una familia de atributos que controla cómo el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializa o deserializa un objeto como XML SOAP codificado.

trans-unit.source: The resulting XML conforms to section 5 of the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document, "Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) 1.1".
trans-unit.target: El XML resultante se ajusta a la sección 5 del documento Consorcio WWC (www.w3.org), "Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) 1.1".

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control Encoded SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener una lista completa de atributos similares, vea [atributos que controlan la serialización SOAP codificada](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization.md).

trans-unit.source: To serialize an object as an encoded SOAP message, you must construct the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> using an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> created with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> class.
trans-unit.target: Para serializar un objeto como un mensaje SOAP codificado, se debe crear el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> con una <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> creado con la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> método de la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> clase.

trans-unit.source: When applying the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute>, specify the <xref:System.Type> of the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Al aplicar el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute>, especifique el <xref:System.Type> de la clase derivada.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes objects that include both the base and the derived classes, it can then recognize both object types.
trans-unit.target: Cuando el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializa objetos que incluyan la clase base y las clases derivadas, a continuación, se pueden reconocer ambos tipos de objeto.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute> to include derived classes in service description documents that are written in the Web Services Description Language (WSDL).
trans-unit.target: Puede usar el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute> para incluir clases derivadas en documentos de descripción de servicio que se escriben en el lenguaje de descripción de servicios Web (WSDL).

trans-unit.source: For example, if a method returns an <xref:System.Object>, apply the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute> to the method and specify the actual types that should be returned.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, si el método devuelve un <xref:System.Object>, aplicar el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute> al método y especifique los tipos reales que se deben devolver.

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) specification, "Web Services Description Language (WSDL) 1.1".
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de WSDL, vea la especificación del Consorcio WWC (www.w3.org), "Web Services Description Language (WSDL) 1.1".

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre el uso de atributos, vea [atributos](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example applies the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute> twice to an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo siguiente aplica el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute> dos veces a un método de servicio Web XML.

trans-unit.source: The method returns an object of type `Vehicle` (a base class).
trans-unit.target: El método devuelve un objeto de tipo `Vehicle` (una clase base).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute> allows the method to return instances of classes derived from the `Vehicle` class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute> permite que el método devolver instancias de clases derivadas de la `Vehicle` clase.

trans-unit.source: The type of the object to include.
trans-unit.target: Tipo del objeto que se va a incluir.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute" /> class using the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute" /> utilizando el tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: Apply multiple instances of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute> to a field or property that returns either an array of objects, an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> that contains a collection of objects, or an object that can return multiple types.
trans-unit.target: Aplicar varias instancias de la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute> a un campo o propiedad que devuelve una matriz de objetos, un <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> que contiene una colección de objetos o un objeto que puede devolver varios tipos.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute.Type%2A> property for each type that you want the field or property to contain.
trans-unit.target: Establecer el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute.Type%2A> propiedad para cada tipo que desea que el campo o propiedad que se va a contener.

trans-unit.source: The following example applies the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute> twice to an XML Web services method.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo siguiente aplica el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute> dos veces para XML Web services (método).

trans-unit.source: The method returns an object of type `Vehicle` (a base class).
trans-unit.target: El método devuelve un objeto de tipo `Vehicle` (una clase base).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute> allows the method to return instances of classes derived from the `Vehicle` class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute> permite que el método devolver instancias de clases derivadas de la `Vehicle` clase.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of the object to use when serializing or deserializing an object.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el tipo del objeto que debe utilizarse cuando se serializa o se deserializa un objeto.

trans-unit.source: The type of the object to include.
trans-unit.target: Tipo del objeto que se va a incluir.

trans-unit.source: Apply multiple instances of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute> to a field or property that returns either an array of objects, an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> that contains a collection of objects, or an object that can return multiple types.
trans-unit.target: Aplicar varias instancias de la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute> a un campo o propiedad que devuelve una matriz de objetos, un <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> que contiene una colección de objetos o un objeto que puede devolver varios tipos.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute.Type%2A> property for each type that you want the field or property to contain.
trans-unit.target: Establecer el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute.Type%2A> propiedad para cada tipo que desea que el campo o propiedad que se va a contener.

trans-unit.source: The following example applies the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute> twice to an XML Web services method.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo siguiente aplica el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute> dos veces para XML Web services (método).

trans-unit.source: The method returns an object of type `Vehicle` (a base class).
trans-unit.target: El método devuelve un objeto de tipo `Vehicle` (una clase base).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute> allows the method to return instances of classes derived from the `Vehicle` class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute> permite que el método devolver instancias de clases derivadas de la `Vehicle` clase.
